item.title: Bitcoin ETFs Score $197.8M Uptober Surge as Ethereum 8-day Inflow Streak Snaps
item.description:
Bitcoin ETFs have attracted $197.8 million in net inflows on October 9, pushing total assets to $164.79 billion, with BlackRock dominating and Ethereum ETFs posting outflows after an eight-day inflow streak.

item.title: Why Is Crypto Down Today? – October 10, 2025
item.description:
The crypto market is down today. BTC fell to $121,142 and ETH to $4,332. “This period of consolidation suggests investors hesitate to commit new capital to high-volatility assets while equity valuations remain inflated.”

item.title: Democrats Propose ‘Restricted List’ for DeFi Protocols in Bill That Could ‘Kill’ Sector
item.description:
Senate Democrats sent Republicans a counter-proposal permitting Treasury to create a restricted list for DeFi protocols with Know Your Customer rules on crypto frontends, triggering immediate halt to bipartisan negotiations as industry leaders warn it could push innovation offshore.
